text: Chertan () is a rural locality (a selo) in Duvansky Selsoviet, Duvansky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 242 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 35 km from Mesyagutovo, 3 km from Duvan. == References == Category:Rural localities in Duvansky District
title: Chertan, Republic of Bashkortostan
